data.actual_result: It only asks one time for the permissions. If you join a voice channel, you will also see the warning that Discord is not detecting any input from your mic.
data.expected_result: Discord should ask a second time for the camera and microphone permissions.
data.short_description: [Mojave specific] Discord doesn't ask again for camera and microphone permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Discord already asked one time for your microphone or camera permission - Go to your System Settings - Open Security & Privacy - Go to Privacy - Remove the permission to access your microphone or camera - Go back to Discord and join any voice channel or start a video call - Observe it
